flowWorkspace 4.0.8

    • flowWorkspace Introduction: A Package to store and maninpulate gated flow data

Copy a node along with all of its descendant nodes to the given ancestor

gh_copy_gate.Rd

Copy a node along with all of its descendant nodes to the given ancestor

copyNode(gh, node, to)

gh_copy_gate(gh, node, to)

Arguments

gh

GatingHierarchy
node

the node to be copied
to

the new parent node under which the node will be copied

Examples

library(flowWorkspace)
dataDir <- system.file("extdata",package="flowWorkspaceData")
suppressMessages(gs <- load_gs(list.files(dataDir, pattern = "gs_manual",full = TRUE)))
gh <- gs[[1]]
old.parent <- gs_pop_get_parent(gh, "CD4")
new.parent <- "singlets"
gh_copy_gate(gh, "CD4", new.parent)
#> done!
gs_get_pop_paths(gh)
#>  [1] "root"                                     
#>  [2] "/not debris"                              
#>  [3] "/not debris/singlets"                     
#>  [4] "/not debris/singlets/CD3+"                
#>  [5] "/not debris/singlets/CD3+/CD4"            
#>  [6] "/not debris/singlets/CD3+/CD4/38- DR+"
